name: bookdoc-iraq
description: تطبيق حجز مواعيد الأطباء العراقي - BookDoc Iraq

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:mobile" "npm run start:doctor" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../mobile-app && npm install && cd ../doctor-dashboard && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd mobile-app && npm run build && cd ../doctor-dashboard && npm run build && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../mobile-app && npm test && cd ../doctor-dashboard && npm test && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm test
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules mobile-app/node_modules doctor-dashboard/node_modules admin-dashboard/node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db
scripts.production: npm run build:all && npm run start:backend

author: BookDoc Iraq Team
